CustomField.description: Calculated MinnPost membership expiration date, for use in automated renewal reminders.
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( SF_Record_Type__c="Organization", Lifetime_Donations_New__c <= 0, OR( Lifetime_Donations_New__c >= 10000, npo02__Best_Gift_Year_Total__c >=5000, CY_contribution_revenue__c >=1000, CY_1_contribution_revenue__c >=1000, Membership_level_qualification_amount__c >=1000 ), Active_sustainer__c ), NULL, IF( MONTH(npo02__LastCloseDate__c)=12, DATE( YEAR(npo02__LastCloseDate__c)+2, 1, 1 ), DATE( YEAR(npo02__LastCloseDate__c)+1, MONTH(npo02__LastCloseDate__c)+1, 1 ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Calculated MinnPost membership expiration date, for use in automated renewal reminders.
CustomField.label: Membership Expiration Date
